ResourceHeader.ResourceName: NASA THEMIS GBO Fort Yukon Station
ResourceHeader.Description: Fort Yukon (FYKN) Station is located at Fort Yukon, Alaska. Magnetic Latitude: 67.25 Magnetic Longitude: 266.67 Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CGM online calculator with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CGM online calculator with IGRF 2007
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically: ASI/GBO: S. Mende and E. Donovan for use of the ASI data.
